name: Ralph Lawler
biography: Ralph Lawler was born in 1938 in Peoria, Illinois, USA. He is an actor, known for Drive (2011), The Sentinel (1996) and Los Angeles Clippers (1984).::Anonymous
trivia: He was awarded a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for Radio at 1780 Vine Street in Hollywood, California on March 3, 2016.
Radio and television announcer for the National Basketball Association's Los Angeles Clippers.
